message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Given its value, it's worth $8,000 to us, but considering the importance of this opportunity for both of us, I propose an offer of $7,200. This price not only allows us to maintain a fair profit margin while ensuring we're providing exceptional value to you. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to discuss how this product can enhance your experience.
